name: Alpha ZCHF Vault
description: The Alpha ZCHF Vault offers a suite of liquid collateral markets tailored for DeFi, providing optimized risk-adjusted returns through an active rebalancing strategy. Morpho Vaults are curated lending vaults that can allocate deposits to any number of Morpho Markets. Each vault is customizable and has a different risk profile. Curators are independent, third-party risk experts who use their expertise to offer various Morpho Vaults.
